0.name: Barbarian
race: You may be elf, dwarf, halfling, or human, but you and your people are not from around here. At the beginning of each session, the GM will ask you something about your homeland, why you left, or what you left behind. If you answer them, mark XP.
gear: Your Load is 8+Str. You carry dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight), a dagger (hand, 1 weight) some token of where you've traveled or where you're from, and your choice of weapon:
ï¿½ Two handed sword (close, +1 damage, 2 weight)
ï¿½ Adventuring gear (1 weight) and dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight)
starting: Full Plate and Packing Steel -OR- Unencumbered, Unharmed
master: My Love For You Is Like a Truck

1.name: Bard
race: When you enter an important location (your call) you can ask the GM for one fact from the history of that location.
When you first enter a civilized settlement someone who respects the custom of hospitality to minstrels will take you in as their guest.
gear: Spur others to significant and unplanned decisive action.
When you enter an important location (your call) you can ask the GM for one fact from the history of that location.
When you first enter a civilized settlement someone who respects the custom of hospitality to minstrels will take you in as their guest.
Your load is 9+Str. You have dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight). Choose one instrument, all are 0 weight for you:
ï¿½ A fine lute, a gift from a noble
ï¿½ The pipes with which you courted your first love
ï¿½ A fiddle, never before played
ï¿½ A songbook in a forgotten tongue
ï¿½ Worn bow (near, 2 weight), bundle of arrows (3 ammo, 1 weight), and short sword (close, 1 weight)
master: A Little Help From My Friends

2.name: Cleric
race: You are one with stone. When you commune you are also granted a special version of Words of the Unspeaking as a rote which only works on stone.
Your faith is diverse. Choose one wizard spell. You can cast and be granted that spell as if it was a cleric spell.
gear: Harm another to prove the superiority of your church or god.
You are one with stone. When you commune you are also granted a special version of Words of the Unspeaking as a rote which only works on stone.
Your faith is diverse. Choose one wizard spell. You can cast and be granted that spell as if it was a cleric spell.
Your load is 10+Str. You carry dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight) and some symbol of the divine, describe it (0 weight). Choose your defenses:
ï¿½ Staff (close, two-handed, 1 weight) and bandages (0 weight)
ï¿½ Adventuring gear (1 weight) and dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight)
master: The Scales of Life and Death

3.name: Druid
race: The sap of the elder trees flows within you. In addition to any other attunements, the Great Forest is always considered your land.
As your people learned to bind animals to field and farm, so too are you bound to them. You may always take the shape of any domesticated animal, in addition to your normal options.
You sing the healing songs of spring and brook. When you make camp, you and your allies heal +1d6.
gear: The sap of the elder trees flows within you. In addition to any other attunements, the Great Forest is always considered your land.
As your people learned to bind animals to field and farm, so too are you bound to them. You may always take the shape of any domesticated animal, in addition to your normal options.
You sing the healing songs of spring and brook. When you make camp, you and your allies heal +1d6.
Your load is 6+Str. You carry some token of your land, describe it. Choose your defenses:
ï¿½ Poultices and herbs (2 uses, 1 weight)

4.name: Fighter
race: When you share a drink with someone, you may parley with them using CON instead of CHA.
Choose one weapon - you can always treat weapons of that type as if they had the precise tag.
When you defy danger and use your small size to your advantage, take +1.
Once per battle you may reroll a single damage roll (yours or someone else's).
gear: Kill a defenseless or surrendered enemy.
When you share a drink with someone, you may parley with them using CON instead of CHA.
Choose one weapon - you can always treat weapons of that type as if they had the precise tag.
When you defy danger and use your small size to your advantage, take +1.
Once per battle you may reroll a single damage roll (yours or someone else's).
Your load is 12+Str. You carry your signature weapon and dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight). Choose your defenses:
ï¿½ Chainmail (1 armor, 1 weight) and adventuring gear (1 weight)
ï¿½ Antitoxin (0 weight), dungeon rations (1 weight), and poultices and herbs (1 weight)

5.name: Immolator
race: When you Make Camp next to a large, open flame, regain all of your HP.
Non-magical heat and fire cannot harm you.
gear: You carry no weapon and need no armor but the flames that burn within you. You begin with a symbol of your sacrifices past, Adventuring Gear (5 uses, 1 weight) and 1 healing potion. Then choose two:
starting: Give Me Fuel, Give me Fire

6.name: Paladin
race: When you pray for guidance, even for a moment, and ask, "What here is evil?"" the GM will tell you, honestly.
gear: ï¿½ Dungeon rations (1 weight) and healing potion (0 weight)

7.name: Ranger
race: When you undertake a perilous journey through wilderness whatever job you take you succeed as if you rolled a 10+.
When you make camp in a dungeon or city, you don't need to consume a ration.
gear: Your load is 11+Str. You start with dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight), leather armor (1 armor, 1 weight), and a bundle of arrows (3 ammo, 1 weight). Choose your armament:
ï¿½ Hunter's bow (near, far, 1 weight) and short sword (close, 1 weight)
ï¿½ Hunter's bow (near, far, 1 weight) and spear (reach, 1 weight)
ï¿½ Adventuring gear (1 weight) and dungeon rations (1 weight)
ï¿½ Adventuring gear (1 weight) and bundle of arrows (3 ammo, 1 weight)

8.name: Thief
race: When you attack with a ranged weapon, deal +2 damage.
You are a professional. When you spout lore or discern realities about criminal activities, take +1.
gear: Your load is 9+Str. You start with dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight), leather armor (1 armor, 1 weight), 3 uses of your chosen poison, and 10 coins. Choose your arms:
ï¿½ Dagger (hand, 1 weight) and short sword (close, 1 weight)
ï¿½ Ragged Bow (near, 2 weight) and bundle of arrows (3 ammo, 1 weight)

9.name: Wizard
race: Magic is as natural as breath to you. Detect Magic is a cantrip for you.
Choose one cleric spell. You can cast it as if it was a wizard spell.
gear: Your load is 7+Str. You start with your spellbook (1 weight) and dungeon rations (5 uses, 1 weight). Choose your defenses:
ï¿½ Bag of books (5 uses, 2 weight) and 3 healing potions
